definition: Isle of Man, British Isles/Isle of Mann
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Manx and Siamese have been mentioned as being among the longest-lived pedigreed cats.
sentences.chinese: 有報導說馬恩島無尾貓和暹羅貓是能活得最長的貓。
